name: Culinary trail with a caterpillar
description:
The caterpillar walks through the forest and looks at the leaves on the trees, which it also wants to taste. The forester and his dog prevent the caterpillar from culinary pleasures because the forester wants to preserve the trees...

The caterpillar persists until it eats all the leaves one by one. When it eats all the leaves it turns into a butterfly.
